code:
import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export const userSlice=createSlice({name:'user',initialState:{userData:{},userSeenNews:[]},reducers:{setUser:(state,action)=>{state.userData=action.payload;},setSeenNews:(state,action)=>async dispatch=>{console.log('hi world');}}});// Функция действия генерируется на каждую функцию релюсера(reducer), определённую в createSlice
export const{setUser,setSeenNews}=userSlice.actions;export default userSlice.reducer;
